title: loss of lp
body: Keep losing Lp whenever I click on the store option 2-4k usual, haven't bought anything in weeks. Please confirm what this is.

replies.body: I'm assuming your are referring to IP, Influence Points here, and not League Points.  If that's the case, your IP balance may be out of sync.  Usually, relogging will update your balance to the correct amount.  Let me know if you see any discrepancies, and I'll be happy to clarify.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pzEwERo4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-20T16:31:14.598+0000)
>
> I'm assuming your are referring to IP, Influence Points here, and not League Points.  If that's the case, your IP balance may be out of sync.  Usually, relogging will update your balance to the correct amount.  Let me know if you see any discrepancies, and I'll be happy to clarify.

Yes sorry, I meant IP, and it only happens when I click on the store option no other time. I was about to buy kled but when I was scrolling around to see other champions it just went from 7k to 3.5k and same thing happened yesterday but lesser IP this time. 3-4 weeks ago when I bought a champion the IP didn't drop at first but it did after re-logging in or otherwise I would have understood this glitch :)
